mapper.sql: REQUEST_NO, REQUEST_TIME, TRANS_FLOW_NO, ORDER_NO, RELATE_ORDER_NO, ORDER_PACKAGE_NO, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_COUNT, ORDER_TYPE, TRANS_TYPE, FUNC_CODE, DEAL_PRODUCT_CODE, USER_ID, INTER_MERCHANT_CODE, MERCHANT_CODE, INTO_INST_CODE, AMOUNT, FEE_AMOUNT, FEE_AMOUNT1, FEE_AMOUNT2, FEE_AMOUNT3, FEE_AMOUNT4, USER_FEE, PROFIT, FC_AMOUNT, BUSINESS_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL_ID, BANK_CODE, USER_IP_ADDRESS, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_MSG, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_W_ID, CANCEL_IND, DATA_FROM, DELIVER_STATUS_ID, INVOICE_NO, OBLIGATE1, OBLIGATE2, OBLIGATE3, STATUS_ID, READ_STATUS_ID, DFLAG, REMARK, ACCOUNT_DATE, REQUEST_ID, ROLE_CODE, INTER_ROLE_CODE, REFER_USER_ID, REFER_ROLE_CODE, REFER_PRODUCT_ID, OTHER_AMOUNT, USER_FEE_WAY, INTEREST, PAY_WAY, PROCESS_STATUS, ORIGINAL_ORDER_PACKAGE_NO, ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID, CURRENCY, REVERSE_FLAG, CANCEL_TAG, ACCEPT_INST_CODE, ACCEPT_INST_ID, TARGET_MERCHANT_CODE, TARGET_TERMINAL_CODE, CHANNEL_RETURN_CODE, RETURN_MEG, RECEIPT_SERIAL_NO, MCC, AUTH_CODE, CHANNEL_INFO, TRADE_ESB_NO, RESERVE_1, RESERVE_2, RESERVE_3, READ_CREATED_TIME,

TRANS_DETAIL_ID, REQUEST_NO, REQUEST_TIME, TRANS_FLOW_NO, ORDER_NO, RELATE_ORDER_NO, ORDER_PACKAGE_NO, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_COUNT, ORDER_TYPE, TRANS_TYPE, FUNC_CODE, DEAL_PRODUCT_CODE, USER_ID, INTER_MERCHANT_CODE, MERCHANT_CODE, INTO_INST_CODE, AMOUNT, FEE_AMOUNT, FEE_AMOUNT1, FEE_AMOUNT2, FEE_AMOUNT3, FEE_AMOUNT4, USER_FEE, PROFIT, FC_AMOUNT, BUSINESS_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL_ID, BANK_CODE, USER_IP_ADDRESS, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_MSG, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_W_ID, CANCEL_IND, DATA_FROM, DELIVER_STATUS_ID, INVOICE_NO, OBLIGATE1, OBLIGATE2, OBLIGATE3, STATUS_ID, READ_STATUS_ID, DFLAG, REMARK, ACCOUNT_DATE, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_TIME, REQUEST_ID, ROLE_CODE, INTER_ROLE_CODE, REFER_USER_ID, REFER_ROLE_CODE, REFER_PRODUCT_ID, OTHER_AMOUNT, USER_FEE_WAY, INTEREST, PAY_WAY, PROCESS_STATUS, ORIGINAL_ORDER_PACKAGE_NO, ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID, CURRENCY, REVERSE_FLAG, CANCEL_TAG, ACCEPT_INST_CODE, ACCEPT_INST_ID, TARGET_MERCHANT_CODE, TARGET_TERMINAL_CODE, CHANNEL_RETURN_CODE, RETURN_MEG, RECEIPT_SERIAL_NO, MCC, AUTH_CODE, CHANNEL_INFO, TRADE_ESB_NO, RESERVE_1, RESERVE_2, RESERVE_3, READ_CREATED_TIME,

#{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_COUNT = #{orderCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TRANS_TYPE = = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_W_ID = #{productWid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CANCEL_IND = #{cancelInd,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DATA_FROM = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, READ_CREATED_TIME = #{readCreatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.select:
select ti.TRANS_DETAIL_ID, ti.REQUEST_NO, ti.REQUEST_TIME, ti.TRANS_FLOW_NO, ti.ORDER_NO, ti.RELATE_ORDER_NO, ti.ORDER_PACKAGE_NO, ti.ORDER_DATE, ti.ORDER_AMOUNT, ti.ORDER_COUNT, ti.ORDER_TYPE, ti.TRANS_TYPE, ti.FUNC_CODE, ti.DEAL_PRODUCT_CODE, ti.USER_ID, ti.INTER_MERCHANT_CODE, ti.MERCHANT_CODE, ti.INTO_INST_CODE, ti.AMOUNT, ti.FEE_AMOUNT, ti.FEE_AMOUNT1, ti.FEE_AMOUNT2, ti.FEE_AMOUNT3, ti.FEE_AMOUNT4, ti.USER_FEE, ti.PROFIT, ti.FC_AMOUNT, ti.BUSINESS_TYPE, ti.PAY_CHANNEL_ID, ti.BANK_CODE, ti.USER_IP_ADDRESS, ti.ERROR_CODE, ti.ERROR_MSG, ti.PRODUCT_ID, ti.PRODUCT_W_ID, ti.CANCEL_IND, ti.DATA_FROM, ti.DELIVER_STATUS_ID, ti.INVOICE_NO, ti.OBLIGATE1, ti.OBLIGATE2, ti.OBLIGATE3, ti.STATUS_ID, ti.READ_STATUS_ID, ti.DFLAG, ti.REMARK, ti.ACCOUNT_DATE, ti.REQUEST_ID, ti.ROLE_CODE, ti.INTER_ROLE_CODE, ti.REFER_USER_ID, ti.REFER_ROLE_CODE, ti.REFER_PRODUCT_ID, ti.OTHER_AMOUNT, ti.USER_FEE_WAY, ti.INTEREST, ti.PAY_WAY, ti.PROCESS_STATUS, ti.ORIGINAL_ORDER_PACKAGE_NO, ti.ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID, ti.CURRENCY, ti.REVERSE_FLAG, ti.CANCEL_TAG, ti.ACCEPT_INST_CODE, ti.ACCEPT_INST_ID, ti.TARGET_MERCHANT_CODE, ti.TARGET_TERMINAL_CODE, ti.CHANNEL_RETURN_CODE, ti.RETURN_MEG, ti.RECEIPT_SERIAL_NO, ti.MCC, ti.AUTH_CODE, ti.CHANNEL_INFO, ti.TRADE_ESB_NO, ti.RESERVE_1, ti.RESERVE_2, ti.RESERVE_3, ti.READ_CREATED_TIME from SETTLE_POS_DETAIL ti where 1=1 and ti.DELIVER_STATUS_ID = 1
and ti.ACCOUNT_DATE <= date_sub(#{accountDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, interval 0 day) and ti.ACCOUNT_DATE >= date_sub(#{accountDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, interval 5 day)
and ti.DATA_FROM = 1 order by ti.REQUEST_TIME

select ti.TRANS_DETAIL_ID, ti.REQUEST_NO, ti.REQUEST_TIME, ti.TRANS_FLOW_NO, ti.ORDER_NO, ti.RELATE_ORDER_NO, ti.ORDER_PACKAGE_NO, ti.ORDER_DATE, ti.ORDER_AMOUNT, ti.ORDER_COUNT, ti.ORDER_TYPE, ti.TRANS_TYPE, ti.FUNC_CODE, ti.DEAL_PRODUCT_CODE, ti.USER_ID, ti.INTER_MERCHANT_CODE, ti.MERCHANT_CODE, ti.INTO_INST_CODE, ti.AMOUNT, ti.FEE_AMOUNT, ti.FEE_AMOUNT1, ti.FEE_AMOUNT2, ti.FEE_AMOUNT3, ti.FEE_AMOUNT4, sta.FEE_AMOUNT as USER_FEE, ti.PROFIT, ti.FC_AMOUNT, ti.BUSINESS_TYPE, ti.PAY_CHANNEL_ID, ti.BANK_CODE, ti.USER_IP_ADDRESS, ti.ERROR_CODE, ti.ERROR_MSG, ti.PRODUCT_ID, ti.PRODUCT_W_ID, ti.CANCEL_IND, ti.DATA_FROM, ti.DELIVER_STATUS_ID, ti.INVOICE_NO, ti.OBLIGATE1, ti.OBLIGATE2, ti.OBLIGATE3, ti.STATUS_ID, ti.READ_STATUS_ID, ti.DFLAG, ti.REMARK, ti.ACCOUNT_DATE, ti.REQUEST_ID, ti.ROLE_CODE, ti.INTER_ROLE_CODE, ti.REFER_USER_ID, ti.REFER_ROLE_CODE, ti.REFER_PRODUCT_ID, ti.OTHER_AMOUNT, ti.USER_FEE_WAY, ti.INTEREST, ti.PAY_WAY, ti.PROCESS_STATUS, ti.ORIGINAL_ORDER_PACKAGE_NO, ti.ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID, ti.CURRENCY, ti.REVERSE_FLAG, ti.CANCEL_TAG, ti.ACCEPT_INST_CODE, ti.ACCEPT_INST_ID, ti.TARGET_MERCHANT_CODE, ti.TARGET_TERMINAL_CODE, ti.CHANNEL_RETURN_CODE, ti.RETURN_MEG, ti.RECEIPT_SERIAL_NO, ti.MCC, ti.AUTH_CODE, ti.CHANNEL_INFO, ti.TRADE_ESB_NO, ti.RESERVE_1, ti.RESERVE_2, ti.RESERVE_3, ti.READ_CREATED_TIME from SETTLE_POS_DETAIL ti JOIN SETTLE_TRANS_ACCOUNT sta ON ( sta.ORDER_NO = ti.RELATE_ORDER_NO AND sta.TRANS_AMOUNT = ti.ORDER_AMOUNT AND sta.TRANS_TYPE = ti.FUNC_CODE AND sta.SETTLE_TIME = #{accountDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ) where 1=1 and ti.STATUS_ID = 21 AND ti.DELIVER_STATUS_ID = 1 order by ti.REQUEST_TIME
mapper.update:
update SETTLE_POS_DETAIL
STATUS_ID = #{statusId}, OBLIGATE1 = #{isBilled}, RESERVE_1 = #{reserve1}, TRANS_FLOW_NO = #{transFlowNo}, DELIVER_STATUS_ID = #{deliverStatusId}, REMARK = #{remark},
where TRANS_DETAIL_ID in
#{id}

UPDATE SETTLE_POS_DETAIL d INNER JOIN ( SELECT ORDER_NO, TRANS_AMOUNT, FEE_AMOUNT, MERCHANT_CODE, PAY_CHANNEL_ID FROM SETTLE_TRANS_ACCOUNT WHERE
SETTLE_TIME <= date_sub(#{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, interval 0 day) AND SETTLE_TIME >= date_sub(#{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, interval 10 day)
SETTLE_TIME <= #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND SETTLE_TIME >= date_sub(#{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, interval 10 day)
AND STATUS_ID = 21 ) a ON d.RELATE_ORDER_NO = a.ORDER_NO AND d.ORDER_AMOUNT = a.TRANS_AMOUNT SET d.FEE_AMOUNT = a.FEE_AMOUNT, d.PAY_CHANNEL_ID = CONCAT( a.MERCHANT_CODE, ',', a.PAY_CHANNEL_ID ) WHERE
d.ACCOUNT_DATE = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
d.ACCOUNT_DATE <= #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND d.ACCOUNT_DATE >= #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
AND d.STATUS_ID = 21
mapper.select: select TRANS_DETAIL_ID, PRODUCT_ID, MERCHANT_CODE, USER_ID, RELATE_ORDER_NO, FEE_AMOUNT from SETTLE_POS_DETAIL where ACCOUNT_DATE=#{accountDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND STATUS_ID=#{statusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PAY_CHANNEL_ID like #{payChannelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
